entry.def: A piano is a large musical instrument with a row of black and white keys. When you press these keys with your fingers, little hammers hit wire strings inside the piano which vibrate to produce musical notes.

example.ex: I taught myself how to play the piano...

entry.def: A piece of music that is played piano is played quietly.

means.word_mean: 1. a stringed instrument that is played by depressing keys that cause hammers to strike tuned strings and produce sounds
1. used chiefly as a direction or description in music;
1. used as a direction in music; to be played relatively softly
